paragraphs: My name is Marcin and I am a Frontend Developer and Artificial Intelligence student stationed in Poznan 🇵🇱.
I'm interested in web technologies, software development, web development, team organisation, process automation and artificial intelligence algorithms (in particular Natural Language Processing) 💻
Privately an active fan of travel 🗺, a reader of reportage 📚 and a lover of everything related to the Faroe Islands 🐑.

In my work I value contact with people, continuous development and regular feedback. I want to learn new skills, not only technical but also soft skills. I am open to different technologies, however I am most comfortable in:
about.about-first-p: My name is Marcin and I am a Frontend Developer and Artificial Intelligence student stationed in Poznan 🇵🇱.

contact.message-subheader: Don't like forms? Write me an email! 🥳
